node.html: I'm a software engineer based in Pakistan, specializing in building websites, applications, and everything in between.

Hello! I am Fahad, a software engineer based in Pakistan.

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

I graduated from Bahria University and worked for Wanclouds, Silkroad Technologies and at Board of Investment (Prime Minister's Office).

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

LinknBit is a software agency providing IT Consultancy, Web Design, Web Development, App Design, App Development, and Custom Software Solutions. Backed by a team of Highly Talented IT professionals, ensuring quality products for a wide range of businesses.

  • IVASAP Platform Development using React, React Native, Ruby on Rails, AWS Amplify, Wordpress
  • Egooc Platform Development using React, React Native, Express.js, Firebase (Cloud Functions, Firestore, Auth)
  • Manage Development Operations.
  • Be Zestty, Get Zestty Platform Development using React, React Native, AWS Amplify
  • Development of Aviation Management System using React.js, Node.js, Asp.net Core, Microsoft Azure, Azure DevOps

Worked at Board of Investment (CPEC-ICDP) in Prime Minister Office

Following were the job responsibilities Assigned to me.

  • Management and Monitoring of Investment Promotion Official Website
  • Reporting of UI/UX issues on the website.
  • Managed Workflows and Coordinated and work with Software Development agency (MIS IT Module).
  • Reviewing and Identifying loopholes in FRD and SRS documents and work closely with solution architect to resolve them.
  • Identifying Technology Stack for MIS Modules and system architecture based on requirements.
  • Requirements Elicitation from stake holder and involve them in the process.
  • Requirement elicitation and analysis phase for the development of IRIS solution for organization which includes, web, desktop and mobile applications

(Project Base Affiliation)

Relymer is a Pakistan based provider of IT consulting services and custom software development. Developing custom and platform-based solutions to large and mid-sized companies in Healthcare, Retail, Telecom and other industries.

Following were the responsibilites assigned to me.

  • Bus Mojo Platform Development using React, React Native, Asp.Net Core
  • Povo.io Platform Development using Vue.js, Ruby on Rails.
  • Manage Development Operations.

(Project Base Affiliation)

Silkroad Network Technology is a child comapny of MENA Mobile (Beijing, China). Silkroad Network technology is involved in the developmet of different Software Products. I was a part of Minipay (Smart Wallet Platform) Development team with following responsibilites.

  • Mobile Application Development
  • Vendor Dashboard Development
  • Backend Development
  • Technology Stack: React-Native, React.js, Ant Design Pro, GoLang, Google Cloud Platform

NetOrc: Visual orchestration platform that allows network admins to auto-discover, design, deploy & manage various networking elements for public & private clouds

  • Developed Knowledge Portal of NetOrc Platform.
  • Frontend Development.
  • Backend Development
  • Technology Stack: React.js, Python Flash, Digital Ocean

MenuDriven is a US Based Company working in the restruant/food industry. I have worked with subsidiary of MenuDriven in Islamabad under the supervision of CTO of the technology department of the company for the development of Dine Smarter Platform.

Following were the responsibilites assigned to me.

  • Web Application Development
  • Mobile Application Development
  • Technology Stack: Laravel, Android (Java).

Faraabi Solutions was a startup with software and application development as a core business line. I was involved in the development of Point of Sale Platform. Following were the responsibilites assigned to me

  • Desktop Application Development
  • Mobile Application Development
  • Technology Stack: C#, Android(Java), PHP

Asim Traders is a Good Supplier and Construction Company. The IT department of Asim Traders is responsibile for all the IT related operations which includes Business Process Automation Software Development, Development and Integration of Custom Business Solutions alogn with the training of employees.

My Core responsibility was to develop a Business Process automation system and custom solutions for the purpose of managing Supply of Goods and related works. In addition to that I was also managing other IT infrastructure related operations, that includes installation and maintanance of Networking and workstations.

A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.
A single page web app for Aviation Management, built with React.js, Tailwind css, Highchart.js, React Table
A single page web app for the managemet of Employee Raster, Holidays, and Schedule, built with React.js, Tailwind css, React Table, Node.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Ngnix
BLMIS is a management information system and it is developed for business process automation. I lead this MIS as a Product Manager, It is built using React.js and Laravel
EJV is a Government initiative to provide a platform through which joint venture opportunities can be explore in the conutry. I lead the projec as a Product Manager, It is built using Drupal 8
A single page web app for for freelancers and employers. built with React.js, Material UI.
A single page web Affiliate Marketing Web App. built with Vue.js, Bootstrap.

NetOrc is a multi-cloud inter-networking management, monitoring, and automation platform that helps in monitoring and managing network and server infrastructure across multiple clouds. I have participated in NetOrc Development as a Software Engineer.
I'm currently open to new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
